title: Reported for not banning a champ?
body:
Two players on my team fed because I didn't ban Morgana. Then instead of the other two players reporting them for feeding, everyone agrees to report me for not banning Morgana.

What is going on with our report system? Why is this acceptable?

replies.body: That's bullshit, so you won't even be penalized, man, don't worry.

Did you get a pop up warning notification?

False reports really don't mean much.
reporting people does nothing right now so dont worry about it

It's not. If people report someone for not banning a certain champ, their reports mean nothing.

So calm down.
you wont get banned dont worry about it. Thats not ban worthy at all. You can report those kids though and they can get banned

Wait, so they fed BEFORE they got destroyed by her? That's really something. I remember seeing this a lot in lower elo, kids lose lane and say that whatever beat them should've been banned, even if its Zac or Fiddles. Just making excuses to not feel bad about losing.

I don't really consider anyone "permaban" right now anyway, certainly not Morg unless you know she counters what you want to play.

Should have banned Morgana. I kid, I kid. 

To be honest, until the tribunal comes back the whole system is a joke.

you say they were feeding but mayne they had a rough game.

If they requested a morg ban and you just did not do it cause you were being a dick, its report-able. After all you had an extra ban you did not use.

Why didnt you use all 3 bans? If you only care about 2 bans why not listen to your party? 

The only reason to not ban is either afk (reportable) and Troll/Dick (reportable).
I did use all three bans.

> you say they were feeding but mayne they had a rough game.
> 
> If they requested a morg ban and you just did not do it cause you were being a dick, its report-able. After all you had an extra ban you did not use.
> 
> Why didnt you use all 3 bans? If you only care about 2 bans why not listen to your party? 
> 
> The only reason to not ban is either afk (reportable) and Troll/Dick (reportable).

are u stupid?

who said the OP didnt use 3 bans. maybe the OP banned 3 people but they werent morgana.

so lets say the OP banned fizz,jayce,kha zix.

those are good 3 bans as they are good in their roles. that does not warrant a report to him because he didnt think morg was worthy of his top 3 bans.

if i was captain i wouldnt ban morgana either( i do ban her sometimes)
